about.title: About
about.intro: As a kid, I loved building with Lego. Now, I enjoy building software. I have almost 8 years of industry experience in full-stack software development at companies in the building and retail sectors.

highlights.title: Key Accomplishments
items: Designed database tables and RESTful APIs
Developed mobile apps for Android and iOS devices
Led front-end development of a large-scale project over several years

about.collaboration: Throughout my career, I've collaborated closely with stakeholders to gather requirements and ensure they were met. I've gained expertise in communicating technical aspects in a non-technical manner, bridging the gap between development teams and business stakeholders.

community.title: Community Engagement
community.intro: Engaging with the tech community and building meaningful relationships is important to me:
items: Volunteered at Manchester Tech Festival events
Attended many industry events and meetups
Recently joined the development team at Straightforward Job Site as a volunteer
Building a Sudoku web-app in collaboration with other developers through pair-programming sessions
Creating an open source version of the iconic Minesweeper game in public, enabling me to inspire, learn from, and connect with other developers
